scripts.version:frontend: npm version patch --workspace frontend && git add . && git commit -m "Bump frontend version" && git tag -a "frontend-v$(node -p "require('./frontend/package.json').version")" -m "Frontend version $(node -p "require('./frontend/package.json').version")"
scripts.version:backend: npm version patch --workspace backend && git add . && git commit -m "Bump backend version" && git tag -a "backend-v$(node -p "require('./backend/package.json').version")" -m "Backend version $(node -p "require('./backend/package.json').version")"
scripts.version:database-api: sh -c 'VERSION_TYPE=${1:-patch}; if git diff --quiet --exit-code database-accessor-api/; then cd database-accessor-api && bump2version --allow-dirty "$VERSION_TYPE"; else echo "Error: database-accessor-api directory has uncommitted changes. Please commit or stash them first."; exit 1; fi' --
scripts.version:backtester: sh -c 'VERSION_TYPE=${1:-patch}; if git diff --quiet --exit-code backtester/; then cd backtester && bump2version --allow-dirty "$VERSION_TYPE"; else echo "Error: backtester directory has uncommitted changes. Please commit or stash them first."; exit 1; fi' --
